document.masterDocTitle: Taxonomy of the genus Miobdelus Sharp, 1889 (Coleoptera: Staphylinidae: Staphylinini) and five new species from China

mods:titleInfo.mods:title: Taxonomy of the genus Miobdelus Sharp, 1889 (Coleoptera: Staphylinidae: Staphylinini) and five new species from China

subSubSection.paragraph:
Smetana, 2001 : 188 (
Type locality: Sichuan : Kangding env .,
2800 m
)
; Smetana, 2004 : 763 (Catalog of Palaearctic Region); Smetana, 2005a : 303 (new records from Sichuan Hongyaxian, near the summit of Wawu-shan); Schülke & Smetana, 2015 : 1085 (Catalog of Palaearctic Region).

Distribution.
Miobdelus inornatus
is at present known from Sichuan Province in China.
